files.patch:
@@ -551,1 +551,6 @@ - /** Produce {@code a>>>(n&(ESIZE*8-1))}. Integral only. */ + /** Produce {@code a>>>(n&(ESIZE*8-1))} (see details for attention). Integral only. + *

+ * For operand types {@code byte} and {@code short} the operation behaves as if the operand is first implicitly widened + * to an {@code int} value with {@code (a & ((1 << ESIZE) - 1))} the result of which is then applied as the operand to this + * operation, the result of the operation is then narrowed from {@code int} to the operand type using an explicit cast. + */
